user_input:
Modify the DHEM model.
                        o	Get the datafile attribute for the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastructure level (use crud pipeline)
                        o	Create a variation of the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastructure level by setting all values that aren't 0 to 999. Copy the H2\Gas.
                        o	Create a new datafile object in the Datafile class using the Gas Pipeline category; call it something relating to PCIPMI capacities Unlimited. Add the filename property with the name of the datafile just created.
                        o	Add a scenario called unlimited_pci_pmi_pipeline_capacities
                        o	Add a max flow property to each object in the H2 interconnection and H2 Internal bottleneck categories in the gas pipeline class, with the datafile and scenario created in the previous step (use crud pipeline)
                        o	Clone the model "DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995" and add the new scenario. Call the model “DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995_unlmtd_pipeline”
author: Assistant
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operations based on the user's input to modify the DHEM model using PLEXOS pipelines.

tasks.description: Retrieve the datafile attribute for the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastructure level using the crud pipeline.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request, select the appropriate datafile attribute from the Gas Pipeline Capacity file for the PCIPMI infrastructure level.

tasks.description: Create a variation of the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastructure level by copying the H2\Gas file and setting all non-zero values to 999.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request, locate the H2\Gas file and apply modifications to create a new data file with all non-zero values set to 999.

function_args.user_input: set all values that aren't 0 to 999

tasks.description: Create a new datafile object in the Datafile class under the Gas Pipeline category with a name related to PCIPMI capacities Unlimited.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request, select the appropriate category (Gas Pipeline) and create a datafile object named to reflect PCIPMI capacities Unlimited.

tasks.description: Update the newly created datafile object to add the filename property with the name of the datafile variation.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Link the new datafile object with a filename property that corresponds to the modified file name.

tasks.description: Add a new scenario named 'unlimited_pci_pmi_pipeline_capacities' using the crud pipeline.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Using the scenario creation tools, register a new scenario with the specified name.

tasks.description: Add a max flow property to each object in the H2 interconnection and H2 Internal bottleneck categories in the gas pipeline class, linking the property to the new datafile and scenario.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Identify objects in the H2 interconnection and H2 Internal bottleneck categories and update them with a max flow property referencing the new datafile and scenario.

tasks.description: Clone the model 'DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995', add the new scenario, and rename the model to 'DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995_unlmtd_pipeline'.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Select the DHEM model, clone it, attach the new scenario, and rename it as specified.
